title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 - Precision Trackball Mouse with Dual Connectivity

Description: Discover the precision of the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, designed to enhance your computing experience. This innovative mouse features a responsive trackball for smooth, effortless navigation and side-scrolling capabilities, ideal for users seeking accuracy and comfort during prolonged use. With a modest 300 DPI sensitivity, it provides precise cursor control.

Available in a sleek palette of red, gray, and white, this mouse adds a touch of style to your workspace. Its compact dimensions, 7 inches long, 2.5 inches tall, and 4 inches wide, ensure it fits seamlessly on any desk. Versatile connectivity is ensured with both PS/2 and USB options, offering broad compatibility across various computer systems.

The Logitech Trackman Marble is equipped with two buttons, accommodating ambidextrous use, and is crafted to cater to both left and right-hand users. Originating from China, this robust wired mouse is a top selection for anyone in search of a dependable and user-friendly pointing device.

Title: Logitech Trackman Marble Trackball Mouse (2017) - Ergonomic Design, 300 DPI

Description: Elevate your computing experience with the sleek Logitech Trackman Marble Trackball Mouse, crafted for precision and comfort. Ideal for users who spend endless hours on their computer, this mouse features a smooth trackball for effortless side-scrolling and pointer navigation. The 300 DPI sensitivity ensures accuracy for your daily tasks. Available in stylish red, gray, and white, this mouse measures 7x2.5x4 inches, fitting seamlessly into your workspace. It offers dual connectivity with both PS/2 and USB options, ensuring broad compatibility with various computer systems. Designed to accommodate ambidextrous use with its two-button setup, the Logitech Trackman Marble is a versatile choice for any user. Originating from China, this dependable wired mouse is the perfect companion for those prioritizing efficiency and ergonomic comfort in their input device.

Compact in design, the mouse measures 7 inches long, 2.5 inches tall, and 4 inches wide, fitting comfortably on your desk. Crafted with quality in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is the ideal choice for users seeking a dependable, ergonomic mouse that delivers on both performance and comfort.

Description: Elevate your computing experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017, a trackball mouse designed for precision and comfort. This mouse features a responsive 300 DPI sensor and comes in a sleek selection of colors: red, gray, and white, to match your personal style or office decor.

Compact in design, the dimensions are 7" in length, 2.5" in height, and 4" in width, ensuring it won't clutter your workspace. Versatile connectivity is provided through both PS/2 and USB ports, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of computer systems. The two-button layout is thoughtfully designed to accommodate both left and right-handed users, making it a user-friendly option for diverse users.

Proudly crafted in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble is the perfect companion for professionals and enthusiasts alike who seek a reliable, efficient trackball mouse. Add it to your tech toolkit today!

Title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white

Description: Introducing the brand-new Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, an exceptional input device for your computer needs. This mouse boasts a trackball with side-to-side scrolling features, making it an excellent choice for those who require a precise and ergonomic mouse for extended periods. It has a maximum DPI of 300 and is available in three colors: red, gray, and white. Measuring at 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this wired mouse has a PS/2 and USB connectivity, making it compatible with most computers. With two buttons, this mouse is suitable for both left and right-handed users. With a country of origin from China, this mouse is a must-have for those who are looking for a reliable and efficient input device.
